verses.verse: So king <WH4428> SHlomo <WH8010> was king <WH4428> over all Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And these were the princes <WH8269> which he had; Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659> the Kohen <WH3548>,
Elihoreph <WH456> and Ahiah <WH281>, the sons <WH1121> of Shisha <WH7894>, scribes <WH5608> <WH8802>; Y'hoshafat <WH3092> the son <WH1121> of Ahilud <WH286>, the recorder <WH2142> <WH8688>.
And Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Y'hoyada <WH3077> was over the host <WH6635>: and Zadok <WH6659> and Evyatar <WH54> were the Kohanim <WH3548>:

And Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Natan <WH5416> was over the officers <WH5324> <WH8737>: and Zabud <WH2071> the son <WH1121> of Natan <WH5416> was principal officer <WH3548>, and the king's <WH4428> friend <WH7463>:
And Ahishar <WH301> was over the household <WH1004>: and Adoniram <WH141> the son <WH1121> of Abda <WH5653> was over the tribute <WH4522>.

And SHlomo <WH8010> had twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> officers <WH5324> <WH8737> over all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which provided victuals <WH3557> <WH8773> for the king <WH4428> and his household <WH1004>: each man <WH259> his month <WH2320> in a year <WH8141> made provision <WH3557> <WH8771>.
And these are their names <WH8034>: The son of Hur <WH1133>, in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>:
The son of Dekar <WH1128> <WH8677> <WH1857>, in Makaz <WH4739>, and in Shaalbim <WH8169>, and Bethshemesh <WH1053>, and Elonbethhanan <WH358>:
The son of Hesed <WH1136> <WH8676> <WH2618>, in Aruboth <WH700>; to him pertained Sochoh <WH7755>, and all the land <WH776> of Hepher <WH2660>:
The son of Abinadab <WH1125>, in all the region <WH5299> of Dor <WH1756>; which had Taphath <WH2955> the daughter <WH1323> of SHlomo <WH8010> to wife <WH802>:

Baana <WH1195> the son <WH1121> of Ahilud <WH286>; to him pertained Taanach <WH8590> and Megiddo <WH4023>, and all Bethshean <WH1052>, which is by <WH681> Zartanah <WH6891> beneath Yizre`el <WH3157>, from Bethshean <WH1052> to Hevelmeholah <WH65>, even unto the place that is beyond <WH5676> Jokneam <WH3361>:

The son of Geber <WH1127>, in Ramothgilead <WH1568> <WH7433>; to him pertained the towns <WH2333> of Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, which are in Gil`ad <WH1568>; to him also pertained the region <WH2256> of Argob <WH709>, which is in Bashan <WH1316>, threescore <WH8346> great <WH1419> cities <WH5892> with walls <WH2346> and brasen <WH5178> bars <WH1280>:
Ahinadab <WH292> the son <WH1121> of Iddo <WH5714> had Mahanaim <WH4266>:
Ahimaaz <WH290> was in Naftali <WH5321>; he also took <WH3947> <WH8804> Basmath <WH1315> the daughter <WH1323> of SHlomo <WH8010> to wife <WH802>:
Baanah <WH1195> the son <WH1121> of Hushai <WH2365> was in Asher <WH836> and in Aloth <WH1175>:
Y'hoshafat <WH3092> the son <WH1121> of Paruah <WH6515>, in Yissakhar <WH3485>:
Shimei <WH8096> the son <WH1121> of Elah <WH414>, in Binyamin <WH1144>:

Geber <WH1398> the son <WH1121> of Uri <WH221> was in the country <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, in the country <WH776> of Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, and of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>; and he was the only <WH259> officer <WH5333> which was in the land <WH776>.

Y'hudah <WH3063> and Yisra'EL <WH3478> were many <WH7227>, as the sand <WH2344> which is by the sea <WH3220> in multitude <WH7230>, eating <WH398> <WH8802> and drinking <WH8354> <WH8802>, and making merry <WH8056>.

And SHlomo <WH8010> reigned <WH4910> <WH8802> over all kingdoms <WH4467> from the river <WH5104> unto the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and unto the border <WH1366> of Egypt <WH4714>: they brought <WH5066> <WH8688> presents <WH4503>, and served <WH5647> <WH8802> SHlomo <WH8010> all the days <WH3117> of his life <WH2416>.
And SHlomo's <WH8010> provision <WH3899> for one <WH259> day <WH3117> was thirty <WH7970> measures <WH3734> of fine flour <WH5560>, and threescore <WH8346> measures <WH3734> of meal <WH7058>,

Ten <WH6235> fat <WH1277> oxen <WH1241>, and twenty <WH6242> oxen <WH1241> out of the pastures <WH7471>, and an hundred <WH3967> sheep <WH6629>, beside harts <WH354>, and roebucks <WH6643>, and fallowdeer <WH3180>, and fatted <WH75> <WH8803> fowl <WH1257>.

For he had dominion <WH7287> <WH8802> over all the region on this side <WH5676> the river <WH5104>, from Tiphsah <WH8607> even to Azzah <WH5804>, over all the kings <WH4428> on this side <WH5676> the river <WH5104>: and he had peace <WH7965> on all sides <WH5650> <WH8676> <WH5676> round about <WH5439> him.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> and Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> safely <WH983>, every man <WH376> under his vine <WH1612> and under his fig tree <WH8384>, from Dan <WH1835> even to Be'er-Sheva <WH884>, all the days <WH3117> of SHlomo <WH8010>.
And SHlomo <WH8010> had forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> stalls <WH723> of horses <WH5483> for his chariots <WH4817>, and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> horsemen <WH6571>.

And those officers <WH5324> <WH8737> provided victual <WH3557> <WH8773> for king <WH4428> SHlomo <WH8010>, and for all that came <WH7131> unto king <WH4428> SHlomo's <WH8010> table <WH7979>, every man <WH376> in his month <WH2320>: they lacked <WH5737> <WH8762> nothing <WH1697>.

Barley <WH8184> also and straw <WH8401> for the horses <WH5483> and dromedaries <WH7409> brought <WH935> <WH8686> they unto the place <WH4725> where the officers were, every man <WH376> according to his charge <WH4941>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> SHlomo <WH8010> wisdom <WH2451> and understanding <WH8394> exceeding <WH3966> much <WH7235> <WH8687>, and largeness <WH7341> of heart <WH3820>, even as the sand <WH2344> that is on the sea <WH3220> shore <WH8193>.
And SHlomo's <WH8010> wisdom <WH2451> excelled <WH7235> <WH8799> the wisdom <WH2451> of all the children <WH1121> of the east country <WH6924>, and all the wisdom <WH2451> of Egypt <WH4714>.

For he was wiser <WH2449> <WH8799> than all men <WH120>; than Ethan <WH387> the Ezrahite <WH250>, and Heman <WH1968>, and Chalcol <WH3633>, and Darda <WH1862>, the sons <WH1121> of Mahol <WH4235>: and his fame <WH8034> was in all nations <WH1471> round about <WH5439>.
And he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> proverbs <WH4912>: and his songs <WH7892> were a thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568>.

And he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> of trees <WH6086>, from the cedar tree <WH730> that is in Lebanon <WH3844> even unto the hyssop <WH231> that springeth out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the wall <WH7023>: he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> also of beasts <WH929>, and of fowl <WH5775>, and of creeping things <WH7431>, and of fishes <WH1709>.

And there came <WH935> <WH8799> of all people <WH5971> to hear <WH8085> <WH8800> the wisdom <WH2451> of SHlomo <WH8010>, from all kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776>, which had heard <WH8085> <WH8804> of his wisdom <WH2451>.
